description: Schema used to create events, including things like time, repetitions, and place.

description.description: More information on the what the event is.

starttime.description: What time of day the event starts.

startdate.description: What date does the beginning of the event fall on. (MM/DD)

endtime.description: What time of day the event ends.

enddate.description: What date does the end of the event fall on. (MM/DD)

repeat.description: How often (if at all) to repeat the event.

location.description: Where does this event take place.

warning.description: How many minutes before the event to warn the user (either a list or a number).

notify.description: Should it notify the user when the event starts.
